author: @4ian
description:
Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheat mechanics.

Firing bullets:
- Cooldown: Time between shots (seconds)
- Bullet Quantity: Number of bullets created each time Fire Bullet action is used. 
- Angle Variance: Each bullet trajectory will be adjusted by a random value within this range (degrees)
- Firing Arc: Range of angles (in degrees) that bullets will shoot. Bullets are evenly spread within this range.
- Rotate bullet: Change the angle of each bullet to match the direction it is travelling (enabled by default)

 Ammo:
- Starting ammo
- Max ammo
- Shots per reload.  Use 0 to disable reloading
- Reload duration
- Automatic reloading is enabled by default, but it can also be done manually.

Overheat:
- Heat increase per shot.  Overheat is reached when another shot would cause heat to go above 1.
- Cooling rate per second.  By default, this rate changes exponentially based on current heat value.
- When overheated, the object cannot fire any bullets

Statistics:
- Total bullets created
- Total shots taken
- Total reloads completed

Bullets:
- Each bullet is assigned several variables that can be used for advanced object picking
- __FireBullet.BulletID = Unique number for every bullet created
- __FireBullet.BatchID = Unique number for all bullets created in the same frame
- __FireBullet.BatchOrderID = Unique number for each bullet in the same batch. Can be used to identify the position in the firing arc.
name: FireBullet
shortDescription: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheat mechanics.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheat mechanics.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FireBullet

events.name: Reduce heat level (based on cooling rate)

events.comment: This logic happens after all events are executed in order to enable creators to use the "FireBullet" action multiple times in a frame and it will be treated as a single "shot".
Subtract 1 from ammo (if not unlimited ammo)

eventsFunctions.name: FireTowardPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, toward position _PARAM5_;_PARAM6_ with speed _PARAM7_ px/s

events.name: Calculate the trajectory angle and use the "Fire" bullet action

eventsFunctions.name: Fire
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_; _PARAM3_, with angle _PARAM5_ and speed _PARAM6_ px/s

events.comment: Update "HasJustFired" property to trigger logic in PostEvents lifecycle function
Add identifier variables (to enable advanced picking by users)
Rotate newly created bullet, if needed
Add identifier variables (to enable advanced picking by users)
Rotate newly created bullet, if needed
Move temp variable to the next angle a bullet will be sent

propertyDescriptors.label: Cooldown, in seconds, before firing again
propertyDescriptors.name: FireCooldown

propertyDescriptors.label: Firing arc
propertyDescriptors.description: If Bullet Quantity is greater than 1, bullets will be evenly spaced inside the Firing Arc
propertyDescriptors.name: FiringArc

propertyDescriptors.label: Number of bullets created at once
propertyDescriptors.description: Bullets will be evenly spaced inside the Firing Arc
propertyDescriptors.name: BulletQuantity

propertyDescriptors.description: Use "0" to disable restrictions on ammo capacity
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxAmmo

propertyDescriptors.label: Shots fired
propertyDescriptors.description: Regardless of how many bullets are created, only 1 shot will be counted per frame.
propertyDescriptors.name: TotalShotsFired

propertyDescriptors.label: Overheat duration (seconds)
propertyDescriptors.description: Shots will not be fired while overheat duration is active.
propertyDescriptors.name: OverheatDuration

propertyDescriptors.label: Cooling style
propertyDescriptors.description: Exponential cooling is faster when heat is high and slower when heat is low.
propertyDescriptors.name: CoolingStyle
